title: Synchronisation failed, dropping peer "lied about chain head"
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.6.5
OS & Version: OSX


#### Expected behaviour
Should be syncing blockchain.

#### Actual behaviour
Seems to be endless importing new block headers, entries, receipts. etc.

Got these errors
````
WARN [06-20|11:19:48] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=d3c2fa2be2720bee err="retrieved hash chain is invalid"
WARN [06-20|11:20:03] Lied about chain head                    peer=3ce6d30744d7e31d reported=120409 found=120585
WARN [06-20|11:20:03] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=3ce6d30744d7e31d err="peer is stalling"
````
#### Backtrace


I get the same problem.
Because of this I can't send transactions.

```
INFO [06-21|10:38:15] Imported new chain segment               blocks=4  txs=281 mgas=16.315 elapsed=13.312s   mgasps=1.226  number=3907326 hash=316185…193096
INFO [06-21|10:38:24] Imported new chain segment               blocks=2  txs=245 mgas=9.282  elapsed=8.813s    mgasps=1.053  number=3907328 hash=0d3b4c…ad4fa2

WARN [06-21|10:39:39] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=46df48266da83cbf err=timeout

```
same here, I detailed my description at the bottom of https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues/14571.
I have the same issue, does anybody has any solution for this pertaining problem?

i restart the node and add some new node to sync, it will recover to syncing.
such as 

admin.addPeer("enode://e737d293373621b0ee5cf3d785fcd5730459ffcdda80dc807242e28e3cdeefcfee546f383edc23e1aafc10d434157f37246c463c1a303a25d36983cd8d9cf6a8@118.24.163.183:30303")
We've put it a ton of work since this issue was opened. Please open a new issue if something persists.
